meanings.sent1: After a long day, I reenjoyed my favorite TV show.
meanings.sent2: She reenjoys visiting the park on sunny days.
meanings.sent3: The children reenjoyed playing hide-and-seek for the tenth time.
meanings.sent4: As the memories flooded back, he reenjoyed the feeling of pure happiness.
meanings.sent5: With a smile, she reenjoyed the taste of her favorite ice cream.

meanings.definition: To take pleasure in something once more.
meanings.sent1: I reenjoyed the book so much that I read it twice.
meanings.sent2: They reenjoy the company of their old friends during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The family reenjoyed their vacation photos and laughed at the funny moments.
meanings.sent4: After a busy week, she reenjoyed the peaceful silence of her garden.
meanings.sent5: He reenjoys the feeling of accomplishment every time he finishes a puzzle.
